title: S Rank Counter
body: Anyone think it would be a cool idea if riot implemented a way to see how many S ranks you have earned on each champion. Like, you can see how many penta kills and stuff you have gotten, why not how many S-, S and S+ you have earned. Riot please put this in the game!

replies.body:
There's a pretty good site for that already. Check it out [here](http://championmasterylookup.derpthemeus.com/) :D
Some official support would definitely be nice though. It could be intergrated into the new client maybe?
yeah that sites ok but im more curious as to how many of each S rank ive gotten
